projects.title: Tech Blog Shorts
projects.description: A social platform where anyone can create an account, post a blog, and receive comments from other users. This app explores interesting topics such as custom authentication, Model-View-Control (MVC), handlebars.js (similar to React), and an SQL database.

projects.title: 100 Verbs - Learn Spanish!
projects.description: A website that aligns with my passion to learn spanish. After learning spanish verb conjugations you start to wonder if you've learned enough verbs. So I created this website and seeded an SQLite database with 100 spanish verbs that I can now practice.

projects.title: Open Weather API
projects.description: A front-end application utilizing the Open Weather API to provide real-time weather data and forecasts for cities around the world.

projects.title: Run Buddy
projects.description: A project based on an in-depth tutorial, I learned a lot about html and css conventions, flexbox, styling, and mobile design.
